name: The Lord Enthroned between the Altars of the New and Old Law
description: The Lord Enthroned between the Altars of the New and Old Law; Follower of the Boucicaut Master (French, active about 1390 - 1430); Paris, France; about 1410; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 19.1 x 14 cm (7 1/2 x 5 1/2 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 5, fol. 88; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Lord Enthroned between the Altars of the New and Old Law
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment
